title: publications

2025

He, Z., Cohen, N., Shu, J., Bo, K., Wager, T., & Ochsner, K. (2025). Comparing the neural bases of self- and social-reappraisal, Cerebral Cortex, Volume 35, Issue 8 PDF


2023
Sahi, R. S., He, Z., Silvers, J. A., & Eisenberger, N. I. (2023). One size does not fit all: Decomposing the implementation and differential benefits of social emotion regulation strategies. Emotion, 23(6), 1522. https://doi.org/10.1037/emo0001194

title: Zhouzhou (Jo) He
text:
Hi!
I am a psychologist and neuroscientist interested in the social nature of emotion regulation.
Currently, I am working with Dr. Kevin Ochsner and Dr. Niall Bolger at Columbia University.
This website is a work in progress. Please feel free to reach out!
